general_advisory: Farmers are advised to conduct harvesting, sowing, and spraying operations accordingly. They should also take care of crops and animals to protect them from the cold weather. Sowing of Rabi crops like Mustard, Til, Chickpea, Groundnut, Green gram/Black Gram etc. is recommended where irrigation facilities are available.

advisory: There is some rainfall expected in the first half of upcoming days, so farmers are advised to wait for harvesting operations and ensure safe storage of harvested paddy crops.
Farmers should start field preparation for summer season rice cultivation and consider using improved varieties like MTU 1010, MTU 1156, MTU 1001, Lalat, Improved Lalat, Chandan, Swarna, etc.

Regular monitoring for sucking insect attacks in groundnut crop is advised due to favorable weather conditions. If attacks are observed, spraying of Azadiractin or neem-based insecticides is recommended after some days of expected rain.
Straw mulching can be used in vegetable crops to maintain soil moisture and temperature during the winter season.
Regular monitoring for the attack of Diamond back moth in cauliflower is advised, and neem oil or Emamectin Benzoate spraying is recommended after rain if attacks are observed.
